item.title: Java Servlet
item.description: This is an error I had while working with a java servlet assignment for my Distributed Computing using Java class. I had to receive parameters entered by a user and then output the receipt. However, I was unable to receive the parameters correctly. Problem: Not receiving parameters entered by a user on a webpage. Code: String sz = req.getParameter(“size”); String[] tops = req.getParameterValues(“top”); String ids = req.getParameter(“ID”); int id = Integer.
